experiences.intro: During this intensive program, I developed advanced skills in cloud infrastructure and backend systems. My key focuses included:
experiences.desc: Bangkit Academy, an initiative by Google, GoTo, and Traveloka. During this intensive program, I developed advanced skills in managing cloud resources using Google Cloud Platform (GCP), with a strong focus on cloud architecture, deployment models, security best practices, and cost optimization. I am honored to have been recognized as a Distinction Graduate in the Cloud Computing Cohort.
jobdesc: Gained advanced skills in managing cloud resources using Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
Specialized in cloud architecture, deployment models, security best practices, and cost optimization.
Recognized as a Distinction Graduate in the Cloud Computing Cohort for outstanding performance.

experiences.intro: During this intensive internship, I strengthened my expertise in fullstack web development with a strong emphasis on backend performance, data visualization, and system optimization. My key focuses included:
experiences.desc: Creating a high-performance document management system with Laravel that improved data loading speed by 50% through caching strategies. I also designed an intuitive financial dashboard with Laravel and Highcharts, providing actionable insights to support stakeholder decision-making. Additionally, I enhanced and maintained a warehouse management system for agricultural asset tracking, significantly improving its operational efficiency and reliability.
jobdesc: Developed a high-performance document management system using Laravel, achieving a 50% improvement in data loading speed through effective caching strategies.
Designed an intuitive financial dashboard using Laravel and Highcharts, delivering actionable insights that supported stakeholder decision-making.
Enhanced and maintained a warehouse management system for agricultural asset tracking, significantly boosting its operational efficiency and system reliability.

experiences.intro: As a Backend Developer Intern at a healthcare technology company, I focused on developing scalable backend services and improving database efficiency to support critical data operations. My key contributions included:
experiences.desc: I was responsible for building scalable RESTful APIs using Express.js to support the reporting and dashboard modules. I also worked on optimizing complex PostgreSQL queries and implemented advanced data aggregation techniques, which led to a noticeable improvement in API response times. Collaborating closely with frontend engineers and QA teams, I contributed to the design, testing, and deployment of key features—ensuring the accuracy and reliability of analytics dashboards used by business stakeholders for critical decision-making.
jobdesc: Developed scalable RESTful APIs using Express.js to power reporting and dashboard modules.
Implemented complex PostgreSQL query optimizations and data aggregation techniques to significantly improve API response times.
Collaborated with frontend engineers and QA teams to design, test, and deploy reliable features.

projects.title: Journal Database Reviewer
projects.desc: The Journal Database Reviewer is a web application designed to help editors find qualified authors to review journals. It also streamlines the management of author profiles and their publications while enabling administrators to grant platform access to editors. The application leverages data from the Open Journal System and Scopus-indexed publications. Utilizing Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques such as TF-IDF and tokenization, the platform efficiently identifies reviewers that best match the submitted documents.

projects.title: Kompetisi Kimia
projects.desc: Web platform built for Kompetisi Kimia 2024—a national chemistry olympiad organized by the Chemistry Student Association at Universitas Airlangga.

projects.title: Cinematxt
projects.desc: Cinematxt is a simple web-based cinema application designed for ticket ordering and payment processing.

projects.title: Spoonful
projects.desc: Daily food recommendation app, Spoonful, that leverages computer vision to analyze and display nutritional information such as calories, carbohydrates, and protein, also recommend the nearby restaurants that serve that food.
